title: Bug 49536 If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and then accessing a URL, it returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and then accessing a URL, it should return an HTTP error 404 instead of an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
SR:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL
4. Verify that the response is an HTTP error 404
